analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med @341a *//
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.🔽The Blessed One was dwelling in Śrāvastī, in the Jeta Grove, in the park of Anāthapiṇḍada.

original: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the venerable Ānanda:

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,🔽any son or daughter of good family who knows the names, clan,

original: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam /🔽rus shes sam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam / rus shes sam /
translated: and secret mantra of the ten great Yakṣa generals,

original: gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so; ;gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so; ;gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not be harmed by spirits, and the Yakṣas will not cause harm.

original: srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //

translated: and those who are left behind will not be harmed.

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
translated: these ten great yakṣa generals, Vajrapāṇi, will always follow me and protect me, even when I am asleep, intoxicated, or completely intoxicated. They will guard, protect,

original: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol pa thob @341b cig /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol pa thob @341b cig / 'di lta ste /
translated: May the Blessed One be so kind as to grant me a boon.🔽May these ten great yakṣa generals—

original: rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gang gnas dang / ldas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bu mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gang gnas dang / ldas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bu mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste /
translated: Jaya, Vijaya, Aparājita, Aparājita, Aṭṭahāyana, Maṇisundara, Yaśasundara, Rūpasundara, Sūtramaṇi, and Dhṛtarāṣṭra—

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log ba dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log ba dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
translated: always follow me and protect me, guard me, and defend me, whether I am asleep, intoxicated, or heedless.

original: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas gsol ba thob cig /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas gsol ba thob cig /
translated: May the Blessed One please grant the words for their complete protection, care, peace, and well-being.

original: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a; tadya th'a /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a; tadya th'a /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken thus, the venerable Ānanda, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so ////
translated: The Essence of the Ten Noble Vajrapāṇis is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptors Jñānimitra, Dānaśīla, and the great editor-translator Bandhe Yeshé Dé.
